text: Les Vandyke (born John Worsley; 21 June 1931 â€“ 6 August 2021) was an English pop singer-songwriter. Vandyke wrote the UK No.1 hits "What Do You Want?", "Poor Me" (both for Adam Faith), and "Well I Ask You" (for Eden Kane). Vandyke died on 6 August 2021 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English pop singers Category:Singer-songwriters from London
title: Les Vandyke
